com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.log

Interface LogManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KCVSLogManager

    public interface LogManager
    Manager interface for opening Logs against a particular Log implementation.
    Author:
    Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the log manager and all open logs (if they haven't already been explicitly closed)
      Log openLog(String name)
      Opens a log for the given name.

    • Method Detail

      • openLog

        Log openLog(String name)
     throws BackendException
        Opens a log for the given name.

        If a log with the given name already exists, the existing log is returned.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the log to be opened
        Returns:
        Throws:
        BackendException

      • close

        void close()
    throws BackendException
        Closes the log manager and all open logs (if they haven't already been explicitly closed)
        Throws:
        BackendException
